hero_subtext: Hi, my name is Maxim. I build reliable, cryptographically-reinforced software without sacrificing the UI aesthetics.
projects_section_text: That's what I'm actually <hghlt>capable</hghlt> of making.
project1_description: A cryptographically reinforced form builder that utilizes ML-KEM-1024, as well as the "ChaCha20 + Serpent-256 CBC + HMAC-SHA3-512" authenticated encryption scheme to enable end-to-end encryption for form responses.
project2_description: A modern color palette generator that can pick matching colors, offers brightness control tools, and employs multiple color mixing modes—even enabling users to mix colors using a quadratic equation with an adjustable aperture.
project3_description: A design tool that offers several customizable shaders, along with features for adding shapes, text, and icons to the canvas. It also makes it possible to apply noise to the entire canvas and blur it.
project4_description: A comprehensive collection of modern, attractive, and unique reusable Next.js/React components suitable for use in both LTR and RTL interfaces.
project5_description: A collection of customizable, reusable components. The components are designed to be compatible with a wide range of Vue3 and Nuxt apps and don’t require Tailwind.
project6_description: A browser-based tool that encrypts files locally without interacting with the server. It uses AES-256 for data encryption and HMAC-SHA512 for integrity verification.
project7_description: A web app that’s capable of encrypting user data, hashing strings, and calculating tags using the available HMAC algorithms. Please don’t judge me too harshly for it; this is the first React app I ever made.
project8_description: A clean andd modern beauty salon landing page template made using Next.js, Perplexity, and Firebase Studio.
refined_chronicle_button_desc: A version of the Chronicle Button tailored for real-world applications.
circular_testimonials_desc: A circular layout testimonial carousel built with GSAP and Framer Motion animations.
slider_hero_desc: A customizable hero section with sliding showcase options, image transitions, and responsive design.
project_showcase_desc: A customized version of the Aceternity UI's Animated Testimonials component.
inflected_card_desc: A versatile card component with an unorthodox image card shape.
fishy_button_desc: A sleek button featuring floating fish that appear on hover.
shamayim_toggle_switch_desc: A toggle switch with support for default on/off state, RTL mirroring, and change callbacks.
metamorphic_loader_desc: A loader that dynamically changes shape from a circle to a rounded square, and vice versa.
bauble_toggle_desc: An ornamental toggle switch styled as a Christmas bauble.
login_form_desc: A flexible, customizable login/register card with floating labels, animated transitions, and theming options.
embedded_projects_section_text: That's what I <hghlt>used to make</hghlt> before I got into web development.
embedded-project-1-description: An advanced hardware encryption device designed to increase the cost of unauthorized access to the user's personal data as much as possible.
embedded-project-2-description: An ESP-based addressable RGB LED strip controller with a convenient user interface, controlled using the Nintendo Wii Nunchuk.
embedded-project-3-description: An electronic shelf label that receives an image via Wi-Fi, decrypts it, and stores it in the ESP8266's flash memory.
education_section_text: Quite frankly, <hghlt>I got my education mostly from YouTube and Coursera, and also by using Perplexity and Google.</hghlt> Nevertheless, here are the degrees that I have.
education-card2-major: Major in Informatics and Computational Devices
playground_section_text: I'll leave it <hghlt>for you</hghlt> to explore.
